animes.title: Spirited Away
animes.description: Chihiro becomes trapped in a strange spirit world. With help from new friends, she must navigate challenges to return to her normal life.

animes.title: My Neighbor Totoro
animes.description: Sisters move to the countryside and discover a magical forest inhabited by spirits, including the lovable Totoro. Together, they embark on heartwarming adventures.

animes.title: Attack on Titan
animes.description: Humans, on the brink of extinction, fight against gigantic creatures called Titans. Eren, a determined soldier, vows to eliminate the Titans and uncover their secrets.

animes.title: Naruto
animes.description: Naruto Uzumaki, a mischievous ninja, dreams of becoming Hokage, the strongest ninja. His journey is filled with battles, friendships, and discovering his true identity.

animes.title: Fullmetal Alchemist: Brotherhood
animes.description: Brothers Edward and Alphonse Elric search for the Philosopher's Stone after a failed alchemy experiment costs them their bodies, facing tough enemies along the way.

animes.title: One Piece
animes.description: Luffy, a young pirate with the ability to stretch his body, sails the seas to find the legendary One Piece treasure and become Pirate King.

animes.title: Your Name
animes.description: Two teenagers mysteriously swap bodies and experience each other's lives. As they try to meet, a connection beyond space and time is revealed.

animes.title: Demon Slayer
animes.description: After his family is slaughtered by demons, Tanjiro Kamado becomes a demon slayer, seeking revenge and a cure for his sister, who has become a demon.

animes.title: Death Note
animes.description: A high school student discovers a notebook with deadly powers. He uses it to eliminate criminals while being pursued by a mysterious detective known as L.

animes.title: Cowboy Bebop
animes.description: A ragtag group of bounty hunters travels the solar system, chasing criminals while confronting their pasts. Spike Spiegel leads the crew in a jazzy, stylish future.

animes.title: Stains;Gate
animes.description: After discovering time travel, a university student and his colleagues must use their knowledge of it to stop an evil organization and their diabolical plans.

animes.title: Hunter x Hunter
animes.description: Gon Freecss aspires to become a Hunter, an exceptional being capable of greatness. With his friends and his potential, he seeks out his father, who left him when he was younger.
